item.title: Measles spreads in Texas. And, how U.S. funding cuts could benefit China
item.description: A measles outbreak in West Texas has sparked concern as cases have more than doubled since last week. And, China seeks to support pro-democracy groups...

item.title: FDA staff handling drug safety for pets and livestock lost jobs in Trump firings
item.description: The fired staffers were tasked with making sure medications given to animals work well and are safe.

item.title: Is Trump preparing to cancel America's ride back to the moon?
item.description: President Trump launched the Artemis program to return U.S. astronauts to the moon for the first time since Apollo. Now, the plan could be a casualty ...

item.title: She worked for years to get a federal job. Within a month, she was fired
item.description: Rose is one of thousands of federal workers who have been terminated by the Trump administration. At 26, she's left wondering what to do now.
